A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Could have been amazing\, but  Rain Johnson seemed to take all the setup from J.J. Abrams and just throw it away. The story seemed poorly written and there are constant plot holes. In the last 30 minutes I was hoping it would redeem itself\, but felt it didn't quite do it\, and the issues in the rest of the movie made it not a compelling or believable story.
